thread.title: jim greene
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by jim greene

author: jim greene
title: jim greene
text:
My recent purchase was my first experience with Frames Direct. At first I noticed FD carries quality product, at reasonable prices. Then I read some reviews and also noticed the website is very easy to navigate. At that point I decided to make a purchase.
My purchase experience was flawless and professional. The website made it quite easy to do. I was smiling on the day I first made the purchase and more so as FD kept me constantly up to date on its status. And the product was delivered on time!
This was a flawless experience and I would use Frames Direct again.
